name: EON ALTAR, a Tabletop Videogame for 2-5 Players (Canceled)
blurb: Journey to the Depths to Reach the Eon Altar in a Cooperative, Turn-based Adventure for Smartphones and Tablets.

rewards.reward:
WELL MET!
==============================
Exclusive Wallpapers, Monthly Updates & 'SIlver Level' online credits!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You have our gratitude for helping make the dream of Eon Altar a reality!  Also receive wallpapers exclusive to our backers, and our monthly team updates.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
See your name in the "Special Thanks" section at EonAltar.com as a “Silver Level” Backer.

VANGUARD
=============================
Eon Altar - The Full Game!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
The Journey to the Eon Altar! You get the entire game, receiving all 9 Adventures as they are released!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  
Includes the previous reward.

ARTISAN
=============================
Digital Art Book & Soundtrack!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Receive "The Art of Eon Altar" in PDF format, containing character concepts, sketches, screenshots, and collections of Eon Altar lore. Also receive a digital download to the original Eon Altar soundtrack by acclaimed composer Tom Salta. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes all previous rewards.

WARD OF DESTINY
=============================
In-Game Kickstarter Exclusive Dice Set, In-Game Kickstarter Exclusive Fate Die Face
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Receive an in-game set of Kickstarter Exclusive dice, immediately giving your rolls the prestige they deserve.
Also receive an in-game Kickstarter Exclusive Fate Die face. When applied to your fate die, your character instantly gets the edge on experience gained.
=============================
Includes all previous rewards.

TABARD
=============================
Exclusive T-Shirt & Poster!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Receive an Eon Altar T-shirt, exclusive to our backers on Kickstarter. Available in both men’s and lady’s sizes. Also receive a High Quality small-format poster featuring concept artwork.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes all previous rewards.

FAMILIAR ============================= 
In-Game Pet, Digital Strategy Guide, Private Forum Access & In-Game 'Gold Level' credits!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Receive a Kickstarter exclusive in-game pet. Also receive a download to "The Eon Altar Strategy Guide," a digital book in PDF format, and gain access to our Forum Exclusive to Kickstarter backers to interact with the developers during production. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
See your name in the "Special Thanks" section at EonAltar.com, and in-game credits as a "Gold Level" backer. 
=============================
Includes all previous rewards.

SCOUT
=============================
Early Beta Access!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Play the early beta of Eon Altar*, including downloads for your local play group, and give direct feedback before the game is launched. 
(* limited to Android and Windows devices.)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes all previous rewards.

BLACKSMITH ============================= 
Design an in-game item!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Design an item, including name and description, to discover in the depths of the Tarnum Caverns! Subject to approval by the Eon Altar design team. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes all previous rewards.

BAG O' SWAG 
=============================
Tote Bag filled with Eon Altar Swag!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Receive an awesome Eon Altar tote bag filled with custom swag, including a mug, pins, stickers, custom Eon Altar Six-Sided Die, a custom Tablet Case, a custom 4-Port USB Hub and High Quality small-format posters featuring concept artwork!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes all rewards from the $100 FAMILIAR tier.

ARTISAN RELICS
=============================
Signed Hardcover Books! The Art Book, Strategy Guide & In-Game 'Platinum Level' credits!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Receive 2 high quality Hard Cover Books! "The Art of Eon Altar," and "The Eon Altar Strategy Guide," both signed by the Eon Altar team. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
See your name in the "Special Thanks" section at EonAltar.com, and in-game credits as a "Platinum Level" backer. 
=============================
Includes all rewards from the $500 BAG O' SWAG tier.

SELLSWORD ============================= 
Be in the Game!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Send in a picture of your face and one of the mercenaries encountered in the Tarnum Caverns will be modelled after your likeness! You will also work with our designers to give personality and history to this infamous character. Subject to approval by the Eon Altar design team.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes all rewards from the $500 BAG O' SWAG tier, as well as the $250 BLACKSMITH tier.

TAVERN QUEST 
=============================
Invite to Private Launch Event!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Attend a private event, celebrating the launch of Eon Altar with the developers of Eon Altar, in Vancouver, Canada*. *Travel and Accommodation not included.  
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes all rewards from the $1000 ARTISAN RELICS tier, as well as the $125 SCOUT tier.

NIGHT OF GAMES ==============================
A Night of Games with the Developers!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You and a friend join the developers for a night of games of your choice, including Eon Altar or the original Eon Altar board game prototype! In Vancouver, Canada*. *Travel and Accommodation not included. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes all rewards from the $2000 TAVERN QUEST tier.

AMBASSADOR =============================
Join the team at a Public Event!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Become a team member at a public event* (PAX East Boston, E3 Los Angeles, etc.) and be part the booth experience! Learn more about the game from the developers and help us share it with the world! *Travel and accommodation not included. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes all rewards from the $2000 TAVERN QUEST tier.

ARTIFACTS MASTER ============================= 
Design a Magical Artifact & Associate Designer Credit!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Collaborate with the Eon Altar team to contribute towards the creative content of the game by fully designing a magical artifact, being included in every aspect of its creation, which will be encountered in the depths of the Tarnum Caverns! Also receive access to the Game Build throughout development! Subject to approval by the Eon Altar design team. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
See your name in the "Special Thanks" section at EonAltar.com, and in-game credits as an "Associate Designer". 
=============================
Includes all rewards from the $3000 NIGHT OF GAMES tier, as well as the $1500 SELLSWORD tier.

BESTIARY MASTER ============================= 
Design a Monster & Associate Designer Credit!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Collaborate with the Eon Altar team to contribute towards the creative content of the game by fully designing a monster, being included in every aspect of its creation, which will be encountered in the depths of the Tarnum Caverns! Also receive access to the Game Build throughout development! Subject to approval by the Eon Altar design team.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
See your name in the "Special Thanks" section at EonAltar.com, and in-game credits as an "Associate Designer". 
=============================
Includes all rewards from the $3000 NIGHT OF GAMES tier, as well as the $1500 SELLSWORD tier.

BEYOND THE GATE ============================= 
Design a Feature, Night of Games with the Developers & Associate Designer Credit!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You and a friend enter our world by visiting the developers in Vancouver, Canada* with a studio tour of Flying Helmet Games and spend a day with the developers discussing game design. Be involved in the design of a feature of your choice. Subject to approval by the Eon Altar design team. 
Then enjoy a night of games with the developers! Also receive access to the Game Build throughout development! *Travel and Accommodation not included.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
See your name in the "Special Thanks" section at EonAltar.com, and in-game credits as an "Associate Designer". 
=============================
Includes all rewards from the $3000 NIGHT OF GAMES tier, as well as the $1500 SELLSWORD tier.
